"The Adventure of Singing Pumpkin Castle" is a revival event.
If you have obtained a "Holy Grail" in a past "The Adventure of Singing Pumpkin Castle" event, it will be replaced with a "Crystallized Lore" for the revival.

CAUTION

"Door of Void: The Arrival of Seven Sins" is a quest that can be repeated multiple times. However, bond points, EXP, battle drops, and clear rewards can only be claimed once.

Warning:

"Cage of the Fallen" is not located anywhere within SE.RA.PH, and it's a High Difficulty side dungeon.
This dungeon is not a part of the Event Missions.

Would you like to proceed?

In this quest, you will form your party immediately before the battle begins.

Would you like to start the quest?

Warning:

[Ultra High Difficulty] Rematch at Reichenbach Falls is a repeatable quest. However, Bond Points, EXP, battle drops, and clear rewards can only be claimed the first time it is cleared.

Do you still wish to proceed?
The path splits in two. Which way to go...?[k]
There's a chilly presence. Something's coming...![k]
The moment you enter the room, a giant lizard slithers out![k]
There's a warm presence.[k]
The floor is nice and warm and cozy.[k]
Maidservants are waiting inside the room![k]
The pillar looks like it has scratch marks.[k]
There's animal fur on the floor.[k]
Howling can be heard from inside the room.[k]
A chimera is sitting inside the room looking cramped![k]
Something jolly seems to be inside the room.[k]
A giggling sound can be heard from the corridor.[k]
Lots of laughter can be heard from inside the room.[k]
Lots of maidservants are sitting inside the room![k]
There's a sweet scent.[k]
An eerie-sounding moan can be heard through the wall. Is there something behind it?[k]
After sliding open the fusuma, maidservants come out and start pressing themselves against you.[k]
You're surrounded by maidservants![k]
The sound of the shamisen can be heard.[k]
The sound of the shamisen echoes throughout the corridor, making it sound like chamber music.[k]
The sound of the shamisen abruptly stops the moment you stand in front of the room.[k]
The maidservants carrying shamisen suddenly ambush you![k]
The floor creaks as you walk. It seems to be old and damaged.[k]
There are footprints of something big and heavy passing by...[k]
A giant apparition was hiding at the end of the corridor![k]
It's a grandiose-looking fusuma that seems meant to receive important guests.[k]
A slew of maidservants are lined up inside the spacious room![k]
A loud moaning sound can be heard from the room ahead...[k]
The area is eerily quiet...[k]
It's so quiet, the sound of your footsteps is deafening...[k]
As if cutting through the silence, the sound of flapping wings can be heard from the corridor.[k]
Whoa, it's a wyvern![k]
It's dark, and you can't see ahead. Watch your step.[k]
After walking through the dark for so long, the room's light is blinding.[k]
After reaching the room without issue, you open the door without hesitation...and a wolf lunges at you![k]
The air feels heavy in this corridor...could it be smoke? It does look dark and black...[k]
This smoke seems choked with evil...it's hard to breathe...[k]
It's a runaway horse![k]
The floorboards are covered in patches of mold. Revolting.[k]
There are scurrying sounds coming from the ceiling... Could it be mice?[k]
The ceiling suddenly collapses, and a giant lizard falls through![k]
It's not cold...and yet there is a chill in the air.[k]
You're getting goosebumps. Maybe it's the strange chill in the corridor...[k]
Your body's trembling. Let's get out of here quick.[k]
You try to jog through the corridor, but a pale monster crawls out of a crack in the wall![k]
The wall is heavily damaged. It looks like a serious fight happened here...[k]
There are small and big scratches...[k]
A wolf carcass was lying on the side of corridor...but then a chimera appeared behind you![k]
A loud moaning sound can be heard from the room ahead...[k]
This corridor is magnificently crafted. You just want to admire it forever.[k]
The gold decoration on the fusuma is elegant and beautiful. Could this room be for someone [sr]important?[k]
The fusuma has been violently shredded.[k]
Sounds of clicking metal, like scissors, can be heard from inside the room.[k]
Inside the room, you find an empty hermit crab shell. But you swear something living was in the room a minute ago...[k]
The area is covered with slimy mucus.[k]
The mucus looks like it's flowing out of the room.[k]
There's an octopus jar...but it's empty.[k]
The floorboards seem to be rotted. It's dangerous because some areas are caved in.[k]
The floorboards are blistered, as if they've been melted by something. It looks like...a poisonous liquid.[k]
A squirming, writhing sound issues from within the room.[k]
A giant poison-spewing snake made a nest inside the room![k]
This corridor has a springiness that feels just right to the step.[k]
There's nobody inside the room, but there is something that looks like a bird's nest...[k]
You open the door and a big chicken rushes at you, snapping at your neck![k]
There's an inexplicably foul odor wafting through...[k]
It appears to be an intense smell of a beast...[k]
A fierce beast was kept inside the room![k]
A shiny, mirrored corridor. How much polish did it take to make it so shiny?[k]
It's so shiny, it's blinding. Let's be careful not to slip.[k]
Light floods out of the room...what in the world...?[k]
The room was full of maidservants in flashy outfits![k]
It looks like a newly restored corridor. The new wood smells nice.[k]
A big koi fish is painted on the fusuma.[k]
A long white line that looks like track markings is painted along the corridor. You feel compelled to run on it.[k]
You can't help but jog along the corridor. You don't want to lose this race![k]
Boars were cramped inside the room![k]
Is the floor slightly tilted? This corridor feels a bit unsettling.[k]
A screeching sound can be heard from inside the room.[k]
Monkeys were playing inside the room! Ooh ah ah!!![k]
This must be the last area of this floor! Let's hurry through.[k]
A familiar presence can be felt from inside the room... Now what could it be...[k]
The maidservants were redoing their makeup and waiting inside the room![k]
You're getting tired...but just a little more. Keep going.[k]
A sleepy growl can be heard from inside the room...[k]
You discover a hidden passageway behind the scroll painting![k]
There is a room at the end of the passageway... Maybe there's treasure?[k]
The moment you touch the treasure chest, a monster pops out![k]
You knock on a part of the wall with unnatural coloring, and the wall springs up to reveal a hidden [sr]passageway![k]
The corridor is very long, and it seems to continue a great distance.[k]
You discover something that looks like a needle...let's take it.[k]
There are tons of holes in the floor. It's like something dug them up.[k]
There are tons of holes in the wall too... Could these holes be a burrow?[k]
You sense something living inside the holes... Let's pass through quickly.[k]
The room was a nest of lizards![k]
You discover a hidden pathway after moving the folding screen![k]
This room is full of pesky insects![k]
You pushed the wall, and it spun around to reveal a hidden passageway![k]
There are scorch marks on the floor. What burned here?[k]
A strong burning odor fills the area, and it's suffocating.[k]
The door is caved in, and you can see something huge inside.[k]
The room was a dragon's nest![k]
A small arrow is drawn on the floor like it's leading the way.[k]
You follow the arrow and find even more arrows.[k]
The room's full of arrows.[k]
There's a line of arrows making a full circle around the room... Looks like it was just a prank.[k]
The door is really hard to open. But it's probably not just because it's jammed...[k]
You proceed by forcing the doors open with all your might...[k]
This particular door won't open no matter how hard you pull on it. Well, if pulling doesn't work...push it![k]
It's a dead end... Turn back and try a different route.[k]
It looks like a big door, but the actual entrance is the smaller door below.[k]
It's an ordeal just to reach the room, but it feels a little cramped with so much inside, too...[k]
There's a piece of paper that says "Treasure ahead."[k]
Drawn by the paper's message, you proceed and find another flyer that says "Treasure imminent."[k]
There was a treasure chest, but it was empty... But you find a Hanafuda Card nearby.[k]
There's a paper that says "Dead end ahead."[k]
You ignore the message and move on, and find another paper that says "Dead end. Really."[k]
There's a room up ahead. It doesn't seem like a dead end. The paper seemed to be lying.[k]
The room has only walls, and no exit. It appears to be a dead end.[k]
When you approach the wall and look closely, you find that there's a handle affixed to it.[k]
You pull the handle and the wall opens up. It appears the door was painted to look like a wall.[k]
There's a sign propped in front of a skeleton model that says "No entry."[k]
You ignore the sign and pass through, when suddenly the skeleton starts to move! You knew that was coming![k]
A cat statue beckons you with its paw. You can't refuse a cat's wishes.[k]
The cat's paw appears to be a switch. You press its paw, and a door opens.[k]
It was a dead end. And then the cat's paw beckons the skeleton![k]
There are rows of things that look like bottles of water. You hesitate to get near them.[k]
The bottles are neatly and beautifully lined up. Is there some sort of ritual going on...?[k]
Nothing happened. But it doesn't completely negate the possibility of these bottles having some sort of effect![k]
Perhaps there's going to be a banquet soon... Preparations for a reception are being made.[k]
The food looks really good... You can't stop drooling. Just a taste wouldn't hurt...[k]
A dragon tooth warrior appeared the instant you reached for the food! Was it...used as broth!?[k]
There are tables set, but the place is empty. You hesitate to go in...[k]
There's nobody here, but the place doesn't seem inviting. It's as if it's trying to repel potential visitors.[k]
It doesn't seem to be a dead end, so let's pass by real quick. This is no place for amateurs.[k]
All the doors are wide open, as if to say "come right in."[k]
It's big and spacious. It looks like you can just pass right through to the other side.[k]
As you cheerily traverse the room, a monster appears from under the tatami mat! Tatami Yokai Swallow Reversal!?[k]
The air is chilly. Ooohhhh, oooooohhh...[k]
Protective talismans paper the walls. There seems to be a presence here.[k]
The stains on the walls all look like ghosts. Nooo...it's spooky...[k]
It seems...to have just been a vibe. Disappointing...[k]
A picture of paradise is painted on the fusuma.[k]
The room's interior is decorated with myriad flowers. Could this be...an offering?[k]
There's a coffin in the furthest room. As expected, a skeleton leaps out from within![k]
A picture of hell is painted on the fusuma.[k]
Skeletons are lying about the room.[k]
The room features what appears to be a giant, hellish cauldron. What's inside...is really not something you should concern yourself with.[k]
It seemed super dangerous, but you managed to proceed without incident.[k]
Chains are wrapped tightly around the door, but you were able to open it easily by sliding it to the side.[k]
A monster is chained up in the corner of the room...proceed with caution.[k]
Ah! You accidently trip on the chain and release the monster![k]
Strong gusts of wind were blowing from the back of the room, but you managed to avoid the wind and pass by crouching.[k]
A monster is coming at you from behind, but it's being pushed back by the strong wind.[k]
The monster also crouched down to pursue you! It's kind of smart![k]
There's a ton of futons arranged in the room. Could this the maidservants' bedroom?[k]
A maidservant(?) appears to be sleeping. Proceed carefully so as not to wake her up.[k]
You accidentally make some noise![k]
You open the door and an intense wave of heat flows out. It's so hot, you hesitate to go in![k]
There are a lot of lanterns in the room, and it feels like a sauna in here.[k]
You sweat so profusely, you might've lost some weight![k]
Seat cushions are lined up neatly in the room.[k]
Is this a place where people come and sit to watch a show?[k]
You tried to sit on a seat cushion, but then a warrior appeared from beneath it![k]
When you open the door, a folding screen appears in the doorway.[k]
Behind the folding screen was another folding screen, and you can't see beyond that. It's like a folding screen maze.[k]
You realize you could just knock down the folding screen! You easily get through.[k]
When you open the door, a wardrobe appears in the doorway.[k]
You can't push down a wardrobe...[k]
You realize you could just jump on top of the wardrobe and keep going! You easily get through.[k]
The warriors did not tolerate cheating of that sort![k]
There's a sign that says "It's safe here." Very suspicious...[k]
There's a sign that says "Please make yourself at home." There's no way you could do that![k]
You relax since the opportunity arose, but then you are surrounded by warriors![k]
There's a sign that says "This place is unremarkable." Very suspicious...[k]
This place really is unremarkable... REALLY normal...[k]
A ghost attacks unremarkably! It's so normal![k]
There's a sign that says "This place is dangerous." Very suspicious...[k]
A lizard suddenly jumps out from the wall, but it's unlikely to hit you because it's so tiny.[k]
There looks to be a pitfall, but it's so obvious that you avoid it easily.[k]
A ball falls from the ceiling, but it was made of rubber.[k]
This room feels really artificial.[k]
The door did not have any knobs to open it, but it opened by pushing it.[k]
You manage to proceed through in the same manner.[k]
Carp streamers festively adorn the room.[k]
There's no wind, yet the pinwheel is rotating.[k]
The May festival dolls begin moving, then...attack![k]
Every time you step on a tatami mat, it shifts along the floor... It's like those puzzles in video games![k]
Some tatami mats take you back, but you should be able to proceed if you keep jumping on mats that go forward.[k]
It feels like you're going in circles...[k]
You managed to solve the puzzle and get through.[k]
A groan can be heard from the next room...[k]
What looked like a wall up front turned out to be a room when you got close to it![k]
The room was adorned with cheery decorations.[k]
A westernized spirit was holding a banquet![k]
What looked like a pumpkin patterned wall was actually a real pumpkin.[k]
Pumpkins are lying about the room.[k]
Pumpkins are stacked up high like a tower.[k]
Pumpkins are neatly lined up... It's like a pumpkin patch.[k]
This pumpkin has eyes and a mouth carved into it... These are for Halloween...[k]
This is...Halloween![k]
The pumpkin starts to move and attacks! Too bad it's not the dragon girl![k]
You find a hidden room behind a pile of straw up against the wall![k]
You enter the room and a scarecrow attacks! It seems now even scarecrows fight on their own![k]
What looked like an iron boulder was a door. And it was lighter than it appeared.[k]
The room is full of metal toys.[k]
It looks like there are mechanical toys too, and one moved when you wound it up.[k]
The moving toy attacked![k]
The corridor smells salty like the beach.[k]
It's starting to smell fishy.[k]
There's a starfish monster! Its foul stench is sure to jerk anyone awake![k]
This corridor smells...strange.[k]
Apparently, it is the smell of alcohol...[k]
Seems like the smell is getting stronger as you keep going.[k]
The smell of alcohol seems to be weaker in this corridor...[k]
The smell of alcohol is weaker...but there's a fishy smell.[k]
There's a starfish monster! Its foul stench is sure to sober one up![k]
There's a super sweet aroma. Is this also the smell of alcohol?[k]
The smell is getting stronger as you keep going.[k]
The smell is so intense, it's suffocating.[k]
The smell is so potent, it feels like it's getting you drunk![k]
Your steps are getting unsteady. Have you lost a little weight?[k]
There's a room up ahead... You want to take a quick break.[k]
Your body's feeling warm. Is your face flushed?[k]
It's getting stuffy. You fan with your hands to distract yourself.[k]
You can't stand it, so you loosen your clothes just a bit...[k]
The winding corridor incites your tipsiness.[k]
There seems to be a room up ahead... It's a room, right?[k]
There's a bunch of fluffy white masses... They look like they'd make perfect pillows![k]
You can't focus.[k]
The corridor should be straight, but it looks twisty.[k]
You see a wavering mass![k]
You're getting a little sleepy.[k]
It would be real nice if you could sleep right now.[k]
There's a futon laid out in the corridor, and an oni is sleeping in it. Jealous![k]
For some reason you're starting to enjoy this.[k]
You skip through the corridor.[k]
You managed to run through the long corridor really quickly.[k]
All this moving around is getting you drunk really fast.[k]
You stagger through the corridor.[k]
This would be a bad time to get ambushed, but luckily it looks like there's nobody around.[k]
Your temple's tingling with pain.[k]
Your head's starting to spin...[k]
You're on the verge of collapse.[k]
There's a pile of straw in the corridor. You just want to dive into the straw...want to...[k]
There's a pile of straw at the end of the corridor. You just...HAVE to dive in![k]
When you enthusiastically jump on the pile of straw, a horse hidden in it jumps out![k]
You're starting to lose your footing.[k]
You can't help but stagger around.[k]
Didn't a certain martial arts style involve walking around like this?[k]
Your eyes start to get droopy. The corridor ahead seems to be a pretty long one.[k]
It's a really long straight corridor. It's so long, you can't see the end.[k]
As you squint, a small oni suddenly appears before you![k]
Your eyes are getting insanely dry. It's even harder to see the end.[k]
How long is this corridor going to go on?[k]
By sitting on the occasional sake jug positioned along the hall, you make your way ahead and rest intermittently.[k]
The corridor will never end...[k]
You're losing focus.[k]
Jugs are lined up in a straight row, so you manage to keep going.[k]
You accidentally almost trip over a jug. Is there alcohol in them?[k]
You peer inside a jug, and a small oni jumps out from inside![k]
As you walk through the labyrinth, you're starting to get lost.[k]
Is progress being made? Or are you going backwards...?[k]
Your tongue's getting numb. You can't speak well.[k]
If you can't speak, then you'll have to gesture to communicate...[k]
A bustling sound can be heard from inside the room.[k]
Lots of sake jugs are stacked up in the room.[k]
Small oni are having a banquet at the back of the room. You want to join![k]
You're starting to see double.[k]
This isn't because...you're...drunk...[k]
It's getting harder to count the jugs at the back of the room. You might be seeing double.[k]
It looks like there's two corridors too.[k]
You haven't had any alcohol, but your chest is burning.[k]
The floor's wet. It appears to be alcohol.[k]
A big oni is flipping the jugs over as it drinks alcohol.[k]
Standing is now impossible.[k]
You lean along the wall and keep going through the corridor.[k]
It feels like you've made progress. Just a bit more.[k]
You crouch down a bit to calm yourself down.[k]
The sake jugs placed intermittently make great seats.[k]
There's a statue that looks like it'd be comfortable to sit on...but it starts to move the moment you do so.[k]
It's getting tough. You proceed slowly as you try to hold down all that alcohol you didn't drink.[k]
It looks like a big room. Maybe you could rest here a bit.[k]
Like turning a new leaf, you feel much better.[k]
The corridor is split in two paths. Might as well take the opportunity to try both![k]
This corridor doesn't smell so strongly of alcohol...[k]
The alcohol isn't strong, but for some reason you have a headache...[k]
Is this what happens when you drink too much?[k]
It feels like you lose consciousness every few seconds.[k]
If you don't focus...you might faint...any...minute...[k]
Whoa, it's a wyvern![k]
This corridor smells strongly of alcohol...[k]
Your body somehow is dancing to a beat.[k]
Your passionate heart grooves to the beat![k]
As you dance through the corridor, a jaunty rhythm reaches you from somewhere near its end![k]
A giant snake is dancing merrily! Time for a dance-off![k]
You suddenly feel sick because you moved around too much...[k]
This isn't alcohol; it's more like poison...[k]
At the end of the corridor, a giant snake is spewing poison all over.[k]
You got a little too excited. Regret...[k]
A large oni has its head bowed down at the end of the corridor. You and the oni might be in the same boat.[k]
You're in high spirits, and you can't help but to talk rapidly.[k]
...Let's just keep quiet.[k]
All this trying to keep quiet has you itching to talk![k]
Mumbling can be heard from inside the room. Okay, let's chat away![k]
You don't know why, but it's starting to get fun![k]
Even the sight of rolling chopsticks can send you into a laughing fit right now![k]
The corridor continues! So fun![k]
Even the slightest thing bothers you, and you spew nonsense.[k]
You want to wrap yourself up...get all touchy-feely.[k]
There's a big snake coiled up! Time for a hugging contest![k]
Tears start...to roll down your face...[k]
For some reason...you can't help but cry...[k]
The tears...won't stop...[k]
And you're getting...sleepy...[k]
The room is resplendent like the dawning sun.[k]
You may have figured out the truth about the labyrinth.[k]
A labyrinth...is a place one must explore down to the last inch.[k]
An oni...is something that must be exterminated.[k]
Memories leading up to this corridor are fuzzy...[k]
The next thing you know, a big oni appears before you![k]
It feels like you're beginning to see something that cannot be seen![k]
You can see it! See it! You can see a big oni![k]
Could this be a distillery? Rows of sake jugs are crammed in.[k]
A huge oni awaits in front of an especially large sake jug.[k]
There's a padlock on the door, but it looks like it's not locked.[k]
Lots of small products are placed on the pathway.[k]
Looks like it's just a dead end.[k]
There's a padlock on the door, but it looks like something tore it off the latch.[k]
The pillar looks like it has a keyhole, but it looks completely broken.[k]
The corridor splits into two paths.[k]
It looks like, past this door, several more doors connect in a line.[k]
There are a great many doors, but doors seem to be all there are.[k]
The end of the corridor is blocked up. There's something in the blockage...[k]
The door looks to have been violently smashed in and no longer functions.[k]
There's a big footprint in the middle of the room.[k]
A giant stone statue was stored behind the hidden door![k]
When you advance through the corridor, maidservants are waiting, carrying keys.[k]
The pathway is littered with various items.[k]
A piano and other Western furniture are placed are the room.[k]
There was a key inside the wall clock, but when you try opening the door with the key, the door attacks![k]
Will this door attack... It looks okay...[k]
The room is crammed with all kinds of stuff.[k]
The path is split in two.[k]
There's lots of switches on the pillar.[k]
After pressing several switches willy-nilly, a key drops from somewhere.[k]
The door is locked. The key you just got looks like it would fit.[k]
A book suddenly jumps out from the bookshelf![k]
There's something underneath the scattered books. It looks like a key.[k]
You want to clean up the scattered books, but let's keep going.[k]
The corridor is buried in books, making passage difficult.[k]
There are some interesting books here, but there don't seem to be any keys around.[k]
Rocks choke the hallway, making it difficult to get through.[k]
There might be some precious jewels among the stones. The rocks in the corner also look like faces.[k]
There doesn't seem to be a key, but when you get near the bigger rock, it floats up and attacks![k]
There's a stack of doujin.[k]
You find something between the pages when you flip through a book claiming to be the latest issue. It appears to be a key.[k]
You want to read more, but let's keep going![k]
Colorful pictures are hung on the walls. Could they be posters of some kind?[k]
There are traces of a few pictures having been torn from the walls.[k]
The pictures say "stealing forbidden."[k]
Looking closer, there's a key that looks like a painting set above a picture.[k]
There's a bunch of boxes stacked in front of the door. There don't seem to be any unique gimmicks.[k]
There's also a bunch of strange boxes in the room too, but they're all empty.[k]
You try to pass through, but a box starts to move and lunges at you![k]
More of the same rooms continue.[k]
More boxes are stacked here too, and these are also empty.[k]
The path is split in two.[k]
The door has a picture of a treasure chest.[k]
There might be a storage shed up ahead. It's full of boxes.[k]
As expected, the boxes are all empty. This isn't fooling anyone anymore![k]
There are a lot of gears... It looks like some kind of mechanism. It's intriguing.[k]
You press a switch, but the gear won't move. Maybe it's broken.[k]
There's something stuck between the gears. You tug it free and the gears start to move. A door opens.[k]
When you try to open the door, it opens automatically.[k]
A giant robot boar jumped out from the back of the room![k]
There's a bunch of holes in the bottom of the wall. Maybe there are mice in this pathway?[k]
A mouse carrying a key jumps out from a hole and scurries by![k]
You throw a nearby box at it and get the mouse...er, the key![k]
A big pot is enshrined in the middle of the room.[k]
When you try to get the key from inside the pot, a pot-shaped robot attacks![k]
The tatami mat is half turned over.[k]
There's something underneath the tatami mat... Is this a book? Maybe you shouldn't have looked at it.[k]
You find a key underneath the tatami mat! And you neatly put back the books.[k]
There are so many things stored, it's like a storehouse.[k]
There are so many things here, yet no matter how much you look, there are no keys around.[k]
There's a key in front of the door, almost begging to be taken.[k]
There's still more storage. There's too much stuff. Decluttering is a must![k]
There are some mysterious mechanical dolls, and you're intrigued.[k]
There's a key inside the mechanical doll![k]
The moment you try taking the key from the mechanical doll, the doll starts to move![k]
The key is right at the entrance, but the corridor is full of keyholes.[k]
You try the key in several places, but it's hard to find the real keyhole.[k]
You have no choice but to try putting it in every keyhole, and the door finally opens at the very last one.[k]
There's a picture of a keyhole scribbled here, but there's no key...but then it opens normally.[k]
There are a lot of scribbles of keyholes on the wall, but they don't seem to mean anything.[k]
There's a picture of a door scribbled on the wall, but it doesn't seem to mean anything.[k]
There's a wooden stick on the floor, but it doesn't seem to be significant.[k]
A key is hanging deep inside a hole in the wall, but you can't reach.[k]
Oh right! You use that wooden stick you saw earlier! Smart![k]
The door is tightly secured by rope, but you cut it with some scissors found nearby.[k]
Do these scissors count as a key too?[k]
The corridor is split in two paths.[k]
You can see a jail-like room with iron bars in the back.[k]
The jail's door seems to be open.[k]
The exit is also open.[k]
There's some pickles. Maybe it's food for the prisoners...or so you thought, but then the pickling stone attacks![k]
There's a mysterious atmosphere in the air.[k]
There are rows of torii gates along the path. Let's try not to walk through the middle.[k]
You'll need to wash your hands to proceed.[k]
There's a key inside the offertory box.[k]
This room has a solemn atmosphere.[k]
This room is ornamented with a big jewel at its center.[k]
When you try touching it, it attacks![k]
The corridor is split evenly in two paths.[k]
You're curious about that last wall, but let's keep going.[k]
What looked like an iron boulder turns out to be a golem![k]
The golem drops an iron board...[k]
There's a big hole on the ground, but you can proceed by using the iron board as a bridge.[k]
The corridor is full of mud.[k]
The room is also full of mud, and it's in bad shape.[k]
The door is also muddy, but it's not locked.[k]
"What do you call a horrible male cow stuck in mud? Terra-bull." Is this...a pun...?[k]
While you contemplate pun-ishing the bad joke, a golem suddenly jumps out from the mud and attacks![k]
There's a vending machine in the corridor.[k]
A coin you've never seen before sits in the vending machine's coin catcher.[k]
The door looks like it has a slot for coins. Putting in the coin you just found opens the door.[k]
It's a HUGE room.[k]
The corridor that revealed itself after its seal was broken leads to a peculiar-looking room.[k]
There's a cage in the back. Is this a monkey's cage?[k]
Inside the cage, a monkey waves a Hanafuda card, taunting you![k]
Sweets are piled atop each other. Could these be biscuits?[k]
A Hanafuda card is included with the biscuit as a bonus![k]
What looked like a stack of money...is all counterfeit.[k]
The creepy hand sticking out from the floor is holding a wad of cash...er, Hanafuda card![k]
It smells like there's a rare treasure nearby...[k]
Lots of expensive-looking antiques in this room.[k]
There's a grandiose mirror. Does it have a purpose?[k]
There's probably still more antiques.[k]
There are lots of big pots. There's no way you can take them home.[k]
A giant bronze statue jealously guards the antiques![k]
Tons of imported goods are crammed in the room.[k]
A giant Western statue is hugging something to its chest![k]
This corridor exudes an air of passion.[k]
The room is warm like the tropics.[k]
Heat radiates from the door.[k]
There are lots of lanterns.[k]
It's so hot...it's like being inside a volcano.[k]
There's an especially large lantern. The lantern's flame flares up and attacks![k]
It's pink everywhere... This corridor makes you feel uneasy.[k]
Clicking noises can be heard from the back of the corridor...[k]
A waiting maidservant rushes over and clings to you![k]
The floor is lustrous and shiny.[k]
It's so shiny even inside the room.[k]
This looks like some sort of mucus.[k]
The mucus is getting thick, and it's sticky.[k]
A rustling sound can be heard from the next room.[k]
A snake woman has made a nest inside the room![k]
A nice floral scent...entices you.[k]
A picture of a cherry blossom on the hanging scroll seems to be emitting the scent...[k]
Something's on the floor... It's a small doll.[k]
There are many cute, well-adorned dolls here.[k]
It's a fancy-looking corridor, like an entertainment district.[k]
It's a fine-looking corridor fit for courtesans.[k]
Kama is slowly approaching from the back of the corridor![k]
This corridor seems to continue.[k]
There's a resplendent room at the end of the corridor. It's like a room from an entertainment district.[k]
This room looks to be a waiting room for the maidservants. But there's nobody here.[k]
A sweet scent wafts from the end of the corridor.[k]
This strangely shaped room is enveloped by a sweet aroma.[k]
Kama is waiting in the center of the room![k]
The sweet aroma seems to be coming from the room up ahead.[k]
Many incense burners are placed in the corner of the room.[k]
The stifling scent is making you dizzy. You try to get through quickly, but then Kama appears![k]
A strange sound can be heard from the room in the back.[k]
The room is overflowing with luxury goods. It appears the wind chime is what's making the sound.[k]
This room looks to be a waiting room for the maidservants...but it's empty.[k]
Maybe it's the scent from earlier... Your body feels strange...[k]
You can barely stand... Let's hurry on...[k]
Kama's up ahead! ...Or so you thought, but then she appears behind you! There are two Kamas![k]
You can hear a beautiful singing voice coming from the room.[k]
There's a pond in the middle of the room. The singing seems to be coming from the room beyond that.[k]
A beautiful snake woman is standing at the edge of the pond![k]
It's filled with an intoxicating sweet scent.[k]
The room is full of incense. Your heart is racing.[k]
Your heart is still throbbing even after you get out of the room.[k]
There are lots of incense burners here too.[k]
The smoke is thick here... It's stifling.[k]
You're in a daze, and you keep going in circles.[k]
The next thing you know, you're surrounded by Kamas![k]
It's a beautiful corridor that you can't help but admire.[k]
You seem to see a dazzling light that's like a shining star...je t'aime...[k]
An intense smell is coming from the room ahead.[k]
Maybe it's the scent... You somehow feel restless.[k]
Kama appears from within the incense smoke![k]
The corridor feels imposing.[k]
The wall is decorated with chains and torture devices.[k]
They look really painful...[k]
A slow-moving creaking sound can be heard from inside the room.[k]
The room is decorated with a giant saw![k]
There's a hanging scroll depicting a graphic scene.[k]
There are hanging scrolls left and right.[k]
You pass by averting your eyes...[k]
This corridor is narrow because it's so cluttered.[k]
There's only room enough for one to squirm through at a time.[k]
Is this a storage room? There are so many things crammed in here.[k]
Bedding is stacked in this corridor.[k]
There's a futon laid out in the room. You decide to walk around it.[k]
Whispering can be heard from inside the room.[k]
You enter the room as if enthralled. There doesn't seem to be anyone here now, but there is evidence that someone may have just left.[k]
Kama awaits you eagerly![k]
The corridor is full of bonsai.[k]
There's even fruit growing on the bonsai.[k]
The fruit is puffy and juicy, and a bit...sexy.[k]
The corridor is gorgeous and draws you in.[k]
Being in this room somehow makes you feel agitated.[k]
You start to feel like you want to stay in this room. No! You need to keep going.[k]
The next thing you know, you're staggering towards Kama...![k]
The floor is slightly warm.[k]
It appears the floor is heated. The warmth feels nice.[k]

"Revival: GUDAGUDA Legend of the Imperial Capital Grail - Lite" is a revival event.
If you have obtained a Holy Grail in a past "GUDAGUDA Legend of the Imperial Capital Grail" event, it will be replaced with a Crystallized Lore for the revival.

Warning:

"[High Difficulty] The Demon of Heaven's Thunderous Descent" is a repeatable quest. However, Bond Points, EXP, battle drops, and clear rewards can only be claimed the first time it is cleared.

Do you still wish to proceed?

Section 1: The Mage's Apprentice -1-

Only the selected Support Servant can participate in this quest.

EXP, battle drops, and Friend Points can be claimed, but Bond Points will not be awarded.

Section 1: The Mage's Apprentice -2-

Only the selected Support Servant can participate in this quest.

Section 3: Accident

Only the selected Support Servant can participate in this battle.

EXP, battle drops, and Friend Points can be claimed, but Bond Points will not be awarded.
There are lots of lanterns.[k]
It's warm... No, it's getting hot here.[k]
The heat is making your face red.[k]
Intense heat can be felt through the door.[k]
The corridor's burning! Watch out![k]
Sections of the corridor are black and burned.[k]
The flame burns brighter and attacks![k]
The wood texture of the corridor resembles meat...[k]
Now that you're thinking of meat, you find yourself craving a steak...[k]
You want to go to a restaurant and eat steak, stat![k]
This corridor is very Egyptian.[k]
The room looks like the inside of a pyramid![k]
There's a sphinx...and of course it starts to move![k]
The floor is soft. It feels almost plump to touch.[k]
It feels like walking on top of someone's body...[k]
This memory foam-like texture...it feels really nice...[k]
All kinds of stuff is crammed into the closet.[k]
Something jumps out from the closet![k]
There's a suspicious-looking line drawn on the floor! It feels like it shouldn't be crossed![k]
At last...! You crossed the line![k]
There's a small staircase.[k]
There don't seem to be any traps.[k]
There's a small coin on the floor... Will this come in handy for something?[k]
There's a sign that says "Toll. Adult 1 coin. Children free."[k]
Let's pay the adult toll using the coin you just found![k]
Honestly...this labyrinth is huge...[k]
Maybe all this time spent wandering the labyrinth has gotten you...used to the place.[k]
Everything looks so familiar now...[k]
Maybe it's better to say that your body's adapting...[k]
You feel like you want to stay here... What a strange sensation...[k]
How did all the shogun during the Tokugawa period feel about the Ooku...[k]
Ooku is...the Tokugawa... And the Tokugawa are...the Ooku...[k]
Something seems to be peeking through the fusuma's hole...[k]
No peeking![k]
A large round silhouette is behind the paper screen door.[k]
The walls have ears![k]
So many...shiny...rows of pumpkins![k]
Don't be hiding inside the pumpkins... Come on out![k]
A lantern that shines like the moon is placed in the center of the room.[k]
The shadow cast by the lantern starts to move![k]
Cute, giggling laughter can be heard...[k]
The ghost of a little girl is playing in the corner of the narrow corridor![k]
